name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania EX REL. Theodore W. SCHELL Sr. v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent, SCI Graterford, et al., John J. Whelan, Esquire, Delaware County District Attorney. Petition of: Theodore W. Schell Sr.
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Schell v. Wenerowicz

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania EX REL. Theodore W. SCHELL Sr. v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent, SCI Graterford, et al., John J. Whelan, Esquire, Delaware County District Attorney Petition of: Theodore W. Schell Sr.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 13th day of September, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
157 A.3d 478
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania EX REL. Theodore W. SCHELL Sr. v. Michael WENEROWICZ, Superintendent, SCI Graterford, et al., John J. Whelan, Esquire, Delaware County District Attorney Petition of: Theodore W. Schell Sr.
No. 283 MAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
September 13, 2016
